translationBlock.key: Find a bug in this page? %sEdit this page yourself, then submit a pull request.%s (Note this page is automatically generated from the documentation in the source code.)
Sorry, there are no examples for this function! :(
Runs a single command for this user, as op. Works like runas(~op, '/command') used to work, before it was deprecated.

This is guaranteed to not allow the player to stay op, even if a fatal error occurs during the command. If this guarantee cannot be met, the function will simply fail. This guarantee only exists in CraftBukkit. Other server types may find that this function does not work at all, if that's the case, and you are ok with losing the deop guarantee, you can set use-sudo-fallback to true in your preferences. If the normal sudo functionality fails on your server then, it will actually fully op the player, run the command, then deop the player, however, this is less reliable than the normal sudo mechanism, and could potentially fail, leaving the player as op, so is not recommended. Enable that setting at your own risk.
